org.lemming.interfaces

Interface Source<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - - data type
    All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ImageLocalizer<T,F>, Localizer
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DAXLoader, DummyFrameProducer, DummyLocalizer, FileLocalizer, ImageJTIFFLoader, RandomLocalizer, ScifioLoader, SingleOutput

    public interface Source<T>
extends java.lang.Runnable
    A source creates new T into setOutput when run.
    Author:
    Thomas Pengo, Joe Borbely

    • Method Summary

      • hasMoreOutputs

        boolean hasMoreOutputs()
        Returns:
        Returns true if the Source has more outputs to be generated.
